specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > Woolen Yarn Woolen is a type of yarn made from carded wool, usually created from the shorter fibers of the sheep's fleece. Woolen yarn is soft, lightweight, stretchy, and airy. It is commonly used to make thick, heavyweight woven or knitted garments.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Coats
